headline.main: Byron Sanders, 76, Actor in Soap Operas

lead_paragraph: Byron Sanders, an actor in television soaps and the model for Salvador Dali's ''Crucifixion,'' died on Nov. 12 at a hospital in Manhattan. He was 76 and lived in Manhattan. He was born Reginald Byron Sanders in Charlotte, N.C., and served in Europe during World War II. After the war, he was the program director at the WOFA Blue Danube radio network and studied opera singing under Fritz Krenn.
abstract: Byron Sanders, actor in television soap operas, dies at age 76 (M)
